LanguageData.V_ES_D3Ds.label: V-D3H shield belt
LanguageData.V_ES_D3Ds.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. First generation of mass production later improvement type. Lower capacity. The cost of V-D3H is very low, suitable for mass production.
LanguageData.V_ES_D4Cs.label: V-D4C shield belt
LanguageData.V_ES_D4Cs.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. First generation of mass production improved type. Standard capacity and energy recovery is slow. The cost of V-D4C is low, suitable for mass production.
LanguageData.V_ES_D5RMs.label: V-D5F Red Moon plus
LanguageData.V_ES_D5RMs.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Red Moon is the final mass production type of the first generation products. Energy recovery is faster than older models. V-D5F is usually offered to combat forces.
LanguageData.V_ES_D11s.label: V-D11 Sailfish
LanguageData.V_ES_D11s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Sailfish is the simplified mass production type of the second generation products. V-D11 is usually offered to combat forces.
LanguageData.V_ES_D14s.label: V-D14 New Hope
LanguageData.V_ES_D14s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. NewHope is the civil mass production type of the second generation products. V-D14 is usually offered to workers.
LanguageData.V_ES_D6s.label: V-D6 Darjeeling
LanguageData.V_ES_D6s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Darjeeling is the first mass production type of the second generation products. Protection capacity improved. V-D6 has a new power system and protection capacity improved.
LanguageData.V_ES_D7As.label: V-D7A Maria
LanguageData.V_ES_D7As.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. V-D7A is the mass production type of the second generation products. Maria immune spirit attack and protection capacity greatly improved.
LanguageData.V_ES_D8Ss.label: V-D8S Solar Corona
LanguageData.V_ES_D8Ss.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Third Generation experimental type. V-D8 immune spirit attack. SolarCorona has unparalleled temperature protection and defense.
LanguageData.V_ES_D9s.label: V-D9 Aurora
LanguageData.V_ES_D9s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Third Generation experimental type. V-D9 immune spirit attack and has unparalleled energy recovery speed. Aurora has a super power system. It will be invincible if the user's ability is strong enough.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D3Ks.label: V-D3Kd shield belt
LanguageData.VanyaES_D3Ks.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. One-time shield. The shield will disappear when the energy is exhausted. V-D3K is a public improvement type. This one-time shield reduces costs. V-D3K is the guardian of the poor.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D4Fs.label: V-D4F shield belt
LanguageData.VanyaES_D4Fs.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. First generation of mass production improved type. V-D4F has a higher energy ceiling than V-D4C. V-D4F can easily handle a small-scale battle, so it is popular with travelers and guards.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D15s.label: V-D15 Blood Moon
LanguageData.VanyaES_D15s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. V-D15 was developed based on the experience of V-D5 Red Moon and V-D6 Darjeeling. V-D15 is a replacement for Darjeeling and V-D7 Maria. Only elite troops will equip it.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D11Cs.label: V-D11Cd Sailfish D
LanguageData.VanyaES_D11Cs.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. One-time shield. The shield will disappear when the energy is exhausted. Swordfish is popular with soldiers because of better price-quality ratio.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D14s.label: V-D14 New Hope
LanguageData.VanyaES_D14s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. NewHope is the civil mass production type of the second generation products. V-D14 is usually offered to workers.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D7Es.label: V-D7Ed Maria D
LanguageData.VanyaES_D7Es.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. One-time shield. The shield will disappear when the energy is exhausted. Maria immune spirit attack and protection capacity greatly improved. V-D7 is one of the most popular products among frontline soldiers.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D16s.label: V-D16 Darjeeling X
LanguageData.VanyaES_D16s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Darjeeling X is also known as Super Darjeeling. it was developed based on the experience of V-D9 Aurora. Super Darjeeling uses a simplified V-D9 power system. Protection capacity improved. Darjeeling X is an attempt to develop a shield for space.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D8Ss.label: V-D8S Solar Corona
LanguageData.VanyaES_D8Ss.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Third Generation experimental type. V-D8 immune spirit attack. SolarCorona has unparalleled temperature protection and defense.
LanguageData.VanyaES_D9s.label: V-D9 Aurora
LanguageData.VanyaES_D9s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Defender series. Third Generation experimental type. V-D9 immune spirit attack and has unparalleled energy recovery speed. Aurora has a super power system. It will be invincible if the user's ability is strong enough.
